Feel good holidays, a fast-growing start-up Thailand destination management company which deals B2B travel agents across PAN INDIA, has triggered luxury travel at affordable cost at Satte 2020. The company has been in the Indian market for over three years as they were registered and licensed since 2016. It is a small-sized company, started with a strong to promote Thailand as a destination to the world. Thailand is rich in natural sources, beautiful scenery, exotic beaches and all kind of entertainments. Satte is a great platform to get connected with the people in the same trade and is a unique opportunity to gain new business leads. Currently working with selective agents, the company is expanding the clientele referred to one another and it has been a great success. Additionally, the company is looking to expand its base to tier 2 or tier 3 cities. Like Lucknow, Coimbatore, and Indore.
